body_content.explanation: an area of flat, rectangular pieces of wood or another material that are attached to the lower parts of the walls in a room, or the wood, etc. that is used in this way:
examples: Varnished wainscoting covered the lower half of the dining and living room walls.
She led them through the opening in the wainscoting down a narrow secret corridor.
The house had much of its original material, including wainscotting, pine stairs, and oak floors.
